name: Savero Fashion Online
tag_list: fashion, mlm, clothing, apparel, indonesia, boutique, e-commerce
overview: Savero Fashion Online is the official e-commerce partner of Savero Fashion MLM. Savero Fashion is a well known multilevel-marketing company in Asia. Its MLM concept is simple and successful. Every two months Savero Fashion releases a new fashion catalog with products like trendy clothing for women, men, teenagers and children. Savero Fashion also offers modern Muslim clothing and fashion accessories. Savero Fashion Online sells the fashion products from the latest catalog of Savero Fashion MLM.
